description:
A Proven Strategy for Building Awareness and Buzz Through PR

Mobile growth hacker and founder of AppMasters, Steve P. Young, reveals the strategies he's used for getting exposure on Techcrunch, Venture Beat, The Next Web, iMore, BGR, and other top blogs.

This step-by-step system allows anyone responsible for building awareness and buzz for a product or service to follow along and repeat it successfully.

EXCLUSIVE BONUSES

Access interviews with former reporters from Venture Beat, The Verge, TUAW and iPhoneLife where they unveil the ways that they want to be pitched.

TESTIMONIALS

"Steve delivers content in a structured way so you can repeat the strategies in your own business."
- Pierre Venter, Founder at AppShots

"Steve was instrumental in getting massive awareness for Sortly. His strategies allowed us to be the #1 keyword in the App Store. And we did it without spending a dime on marketing."
- Dhanush Balachandran, Founder at Sortly

GET STARTED

Click on "Take This Course" and start using the proven strategies to get exposure for your product or service.
title: Pitch Perfect: Growth Hacker's Guide to PR & Media Coverage
